lines.text: The matter is that it's winter, and we are out of gold. I need your prince to come save you soon so I can start hoarding again.
Then hoard, why wait for the prince?
Why, because I'm too busy defending the tower against him! I can start hoarding again when this is all over.
Right let's find him wherever the poor knight got stuck. Then you can have your epic showdown then and there, and we can all be on our merry way.
